summary: REQ-63 is largely implemented by introducing a safe coercion helper for task status values and using it in TaskFormDialog edit-mode initialization, plus converting the sentinel selection to `null` on submit so Radix Select is never controlled with an empty string. However, due to truncation, the diff does not conclusively show that no SelectItem uses `value=""` and that the Select never receives `""` in all Task edit flow codepaths.

missing_requirements.requirement: No SelectItem in the Task edit flow uses value="" and no Select component in the Task edit flow receives "" as its controlled value.
missing_requirements.reason: TaskFormDialog.tsx is truncated before the SelectContent/SelectItem list, so it cannot be verified from the provided diff summary whether any SelectItem uses value="" or whether any other codepath passes "" into the Select value.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified Task bulk edit dialog status sentinel handling (STATUS_UNCHANGED_SENTINEL) and related bulk-edit Select behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on preventing Radix Select crashes in the Task create/edit dialog (TaskFormDialog). Bulk edit dialog changes are not requested in REQ-63.

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded task status utilities beyond the explicit REQ-63 coercion need (legacy status mapping, normalizeStatus, isCompletedStatus, isValidStatus, getStatusDisplayLabel).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-63 requests mapping empty/invalid statuses to a sentinel for Select safety and submitting sentinel as null; the additional legacy mapping and other helpers are not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: URL parameter/session storage utilities added/modified (getUrlParameter, session persistence helpers, clearParamFromHash, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: Unrelated to the Task status Select crash fix described in REQ-63.
